meanings.definition: The action of repeating something that has already been said or written.
meanings.sent1: During the play, the actor's repetitions of his lines were flawless.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her speech many times to perfect her repetitions.
meanings.sent3: The parrot's repetitions of 'hello' always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her repetitions of kindness echoed throughout the community.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's repetitions of the lesson made it easy to remember.

meanings.definition: The act of doing or performing something again.
meanings.sent1: The athlete's repetitions of push-ups strengthened his muscles.
meanings.sent2: He completed ten repetitions of the exercise in his workout.
meanings.sent3: The robot's repetitions of dance moves were amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her repetitions of the song brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic's repetitions of fixing the car made him an expert.

meanings.definition: The repeated use of a particular word, phrase, or idea.
meanings.sent1: In his writing, the author's repetitions of 'love' created a powerful theme.
meanings.sent2: The poet's repetitions of 'dream' added depth to her poem.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's repetitions of jokes had the audience laughing all night.
meanings.sent4: Her repetitions of 'thank you' showed her gratitude.
meanings.sent5: The artist's repetitions of colors in the painting made it vibrant.
